parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns shot information [[Array]] for the given projectile in format [vehicle, instigator], where vehicle is the vehicle the shot was fired from, and the instigator is the person who pulled the trigger. If shot was fired by a soldier on foot or in FFV position in vehicle, the soldier is returned for the vehicle.
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getShotParents]] projectile
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> projectile: [[Object]] - the actual projectile shot
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [vehicle, instigator]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_shotParents = [[getShotParents]] myProjectile;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>batmobile [[addEventHandler]] ["Fired", {[[systemChat]] [[str]] [[getShotParents]] (_this [[select]] 6)}];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setShotParents]]
</value></part></template>

</comment><comment><!-- END Note Section -->
</comment></dl>
